subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, in the Nextel Cup season finale, Mark Martin will drive ack Roush’s No. 6 Ford for the final time. He will race a part-time schedule for MB2 Motorsports next season.
snippet: On Sunday, in the Nextel Cup season finale, Mark Martin will drive ack Roush’s No. 6 Ford for the final time. He will race a part-time schedule for MB2 Motorsports next season.
